trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs when the user changes the value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O `Scroll` evento ocorre quando o usuário altera o valor da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: This event can result from a variety of actions, such as clicking a scroll bar arrow, pressing the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW, or dragging the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento pode resultar de uma variedade de ações, como clicar em uma seta de barra de rolagem, pressionando a seta para cima ou seta para baixo ou arrastando a caixa de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollEventArgs specifies the type of scroll event that occurred and the new value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O ScrollEventArgs Especifica o tipo de evento de rolagem que ocorreu e o novo valor da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property to determine the scroll bar orientation for the `Scroll` event.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>propriedade para determinar a orientação da barra de rolagem para o `Scroll` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `Scroll` event occurs for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> controls.
trans-unit.target: O `Scroll` evento ocorre para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os valores fornecidos para o <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os valores fornecidos para o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The old value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os valores fornecidos para o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*>

trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> class using the given values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.Type*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.OldValue*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.NewValue*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os valores fornecidos para o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The old value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>da barra de rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property will be changed to.
trans-unit.target: O valor numérico que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>propriedade será alterada para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the old <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a antiga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>da barra de rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*> property contained before it changed.
trans-unit.target: O valor numérico que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>propriedade contida alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the scroll bar orientation that raised the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a orientação da barra de rolagem que gerou o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Scroll" name="Scroll" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You would typically use the ScrollOrientation property to determine the scroll bar orientation that raised the `Scroll` event, such as with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você usaria a propriedade ScrollOrientation para determinar a orientação da barra de rolagem que gerou o `Scroll` evento, como com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollOrientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of scroll event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de evento de rolagem que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventType"> </xref> valores.
